data.name: The Killer
data.detailed_description:
In The Killer you will experience a story of action and murders.

The game takes place on a farm far from the city, where you will be able to fully explore it, and you will have to complete some objectives in order to complete your mission. You will have a medium-range weapon and a pistol as work tools and you will have to face an area full of cops.

You will control Dominc, in first person and you'll have to complete some tasks to get out of the farm with the goals you want, locate the targets, eliminate them, and search the farm's hidden goods to steal them. All this with a lot of action, since the farm will be filled with cops, when they know you are in the area. Go to the farm, accomplish your goals and get out alive, or die trying.
The game experience provides a mix of action with a little suspense.



Dominic, a hired assassin is hired to kill a farmer who is fighting over land with a wealthy local man. And so, Dominic goes to the farm, kills the caretaker and the farmer, but someone notices something strange and calls the police, so Dominic must face the cops to get out of the place without getting caught.

Are you prepared to fulfill this contract? Do what must be done in The Killer.

data.short_description: Dominic, a hired assassin is hired to kill a farmer who is fighting over land with a wealthy local man, in the middle of your mission someone notices something strange and calls the police, so Dominic must face the cops to get out of the place without getting caught.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8 or Windows 10;
  • Processor: CPU with 2 cores of 2,4 Ghz;
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card that supports DirectX11 and with at least 1 GB of VRam;
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: -
  • Additional Notes: -
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8 or Windows 10;
  • Processor: CPU with 4 cores of 2,4 Ghz;
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DirectX11 support and with at least 2 GB of RAM (nVidia GTX660 or higher, or AMD HD5870 or higher);
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: -
  • Additional Notes: -

release_date.date: AUG 2022 - Add to Wishlist - discount at launch!
